gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 108, Pistons 95
gameRecap.excerpt: Miami defeats Detroit, 108-95. For Miami, Bam Adebayo led the way with 22 points, nine rebounds, and three blocks while aided by Caleb Martin (18 points, eight rebounds, six assists, two steals) and Jimmy Butler (18 points, five rebounds) in the victory. Simone Fontecchio finished with 24 points (five 3PM) and six rebounds with Jalen Duren tallying 15 points and 17 rebounds for Detroit in the losing effort. Miami improves to 36-30, while Detroit moves to 12-54 in the loss.
